<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a task category"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/task/category/{id:[0-9]+}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the selected task category with the parameters (title, description, etc.) specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Task category ID","type":"integer"},"title":{"description":"New task category title","type":"string"},"description":{"description":"New task category description","type":"string"},"imageName":{"description":"New image name of task category","type":"string"},"sortOrder":{"description":"New task category order","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated task category","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"RelativeItemsCount":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1"},"ImagePath":{"type":"string","example":"path to image"},"Title":{"type":"string","example":"Title"},"Description":{"type":"string","example":"Description"},"Color":{"type":"string","example":"#a7fc00"},"SortOrder":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1"},"ID":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"1234"}},"title":"TaskCategoryWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
